description:
ColorConsole brings a little color to your black and white world of Windows console (cmd.exe). One can save many hand moves and also time!

#### Features:
* Favorites commands
* Export to HTML and RTF
* Copy,Paste,Cut... 
* Changeable font style and color 
* Tabbed working with multi cmd.exe.
* Fast folder switch.
* Portable tool (local data stored in file)

[Screenshots](http://www.softwareok.com/?seite=Freeware/ColorConsole/Screenshots)
summary: Brings a little color to your black and white world of Windows console
author: Nenad Hrg
